title: Introducing the $t$
question_text: Which of the following statements about the $t$ distribution is true?

choices.text:
The spread of the
t
distribution is less than that of the standard Normal distribution.

There is more area in the tails of the
t
distribution than there is in the standard Normal distribution.

The
t
distribution uses degrees of freedom and as they decrease they approximate the standard Normal curve more closely.

The
t
distribution uses
α
instead of
σ
to calculate a test statistic.

The
t
distribution is symmetric about
0
, bi-modal, and bell-shaped.
